Verses: 1 karththar Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Nokki:

2 isravel Puththirar Avaravar Thangal Thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Vamsaththin Virudhaagiya Thangal Thangal Kodiyandaiyile Thangal Koodaarangalaip Pottu, Aasarippuk Koodaaraththirku Edhiraaga Sutrilum Paalayamirangakkadavargal.
3 yoodhaavin Paalayaththuk Kodiyaiyudaiya Senaigal Sooriyan Udhikkum Keezhppuraththile Paalayamirangavendum; Amminadhaabin Kumaaranaagiya Nakason Yoodhaa Sandhadhikku Senaapadhiyaayirukkakkadavan.
4 ennappatta Avanudaiya Senai Ezhubaththu Naalaayiraththu Arunooruper.
5 avan Aruge Isakkaar Koththiraththaar Paalayamirangavendum; Soovaarin Kumaaran Nedhaneyel Isakkaar Sandhadhikku Senaapadhiyaayirukkakkadavan.
6 ennappatta Avanudaiya Senai Aimbaththu Naalaayiraththu Naanooruper.
7 avan Aruge Sepulon Koththiraththaar Paalayamirangavendum; Elonin Kumaaranaagiya Eliyaap Sepulon Sandhadhikku Senaapadhiyaayirukkakkadavan.
8 avanudaiya Senaiyil Ennappattavargal Aimbaththezhaayiraththu Naanooruper.
9 ennappatta Yoodhaavin Paalayaththaar Ellaarum Thangal Senaigalinpadiye Latchaththu Enbaththu Aaraayiraththu Naanooruper; Ivargal Prayaanaththile Mudharpaalayamaaip Pogakkadavargal.
10 roobanudaiya Paalayaththuk Kodiyaiyudaiya Senaigal Thenpuraththil Paalayamirangavendum; Sedheyoorin Kumaaranaagiya Elisoor Rooban Sandhadhiyaarukku Senaapadhiyaayirukkakkadavan.
11 avanudaiya Senaiyil Ennappattavargal Naarpaththaaraayiraththu Ainnooruper.
12 avan Aruge Simiyon Koththiraththaar Paalayamirangavendum; Soorishadhaayin Kumaaranaagiya Seloomiyel Simiyon Sandhadhiyaarukku Senaapadhiyaayirukkakkadavan.
13 avanudaiya Senaiyil Ennappattavargal Aimbaththonbadhinaayiraththu Munnooruper.
14 avan Aruge Kaadh Koththiraththaar Paalayamirangavendum; Theguvelin Kumaaranaagiya Eliyaasaap Kaadh Sandhadhiyaarukku Senaapadhiyaayirukkakkadavan.
15 avanudaiya Senaiyil Ennappattavargal Naarpaththaiyaayiraththu Arunootru Aimbadhuper.
16 ennappatta Roobanin Paalayaththaar Ellaarum Thangal Senaigalinpadiye Latchaththu Aimbaththu Oraayiraththu Naanootru Aimbadhuper; Ivargal Prayaanaththil Irandaam Paalayamaaip Pogakkadavargal.

17 pinbu Aasarippuk Koodaaram Leviyarin Senaiyode Paalayangalin Naduve Prayaanappattup Pogavendum; Eppadip Paalayamirangugiraargalo, Appadiye Avaravar Thangal Varisaiyile Thangal Kodigalode Prayaanamaaip Pogakkadavargal.
18 eppraayeemudaiya Paalayaththuk Kodiyaiyudaiya Senaigal Melpuraththil Irangavendum; Ammiyoodhin Kumaaranaagiya Elishaamaa Eppraayeemin Sandhadhikku Senaapadhiyaayirukkakkadavan.
19 avanudaiya Senaiyil Ennappattavargal Naarpadhinaayiraththu Ainnooruper.
20 avan Aruge Manaase Koththiraththaar Paalayamirangavendum; Pedhaasoorin Kumaaranaagiya Kamaaliyel Manaase Sandhadhikku Senaapadhiyaayirukkakkadavan.
21 avanudaiya Senaiyil Ennappattavargal Muppaththeeraayiraththu Irunooruper.
22 avan Aruge Benyameen Koththiraththaar Paalayamirangavendum; Keedheyonin Kumaaranaagiya Apeedhaan Benyameen Sandhadhikku Senaapadhiyaayirukkakkadavan.
23 avanudaiya Senaiyil Ennappattavargal Muppaththaiyaayiraththu Naanooruper.
24 ennappatta Eppraayeemin Paalayaththaar Ellaarum Thangal Senaigalinpadiye Latchaththu Ennaayiraththu Nooruper; Ivargal Prayaanaththil Moondraam Paalayamaaip Pogakkadavargal.
25 thaanudaiya Paalayaththuk Kodiyaiyudaiya Senaigal Vadapuraththil Irangavendum; Ammishadhaayin Kumaaranaagiya Akiyeser Thaan Vamsaththirku Senaapadhiyaayirukkakkadavan.
26 avanudaiya Senaiyil Ennappattavargal Arubaththeeraayiraththu Ezhunooruper.
27 avan Aruge Aaser Koththiraththaar Paalayamirangavendum; Okiraanin Kumaaranaagiya Paakiyel Aaser Sandhadhikku Senaapadhiyaayirukkakkadavan.
28 avanudaiya Senaiyil Ennappattavargal Naarpaththoraayiraththu Ainnooruper.
29 avan Aruge Napthali Koththiraththaar Paalayamirangavendum; Enaanin Kumaaranaagiya Akeeraa Napthali Sandhadhiyaarukku Senaapadhiyaayirukkakkadavan.
30 avanudaiya Senaiyil Ennappattavargal Aimbaththu Moovaayiraththu Naanooruper.
31 ennappatta Thaanin Paalayaththaar Ellaarum Latchaththu Aimbaththezhaayiraththu Arunooruper; Ivargal Thangal Kodigalode Pinpaalayamaaip Pogakkadavargal.

32 ivargale Thangal Thangal Pidhaakkalin Vamsaththinpadi Isravel Puththiraril Ennappattavargal. Paalayangalile Thangal Thangal Senaigalinpadiye Ennappattavargal Ellaarum Aarulatchaththu Moovaayiraththu Ainnootru Aimbadhu Peraayirundhaargal.

33 leviyaro, Karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadi, Isravel Puththirarukkulle Ennappadavillai.karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiyellaam Isravel Puththirar Seydhu, Thangal Thangal Kodigalinkeezh Paalayamirangi, Thangal Thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Vamsangalinpadiye Prayaanappattupponaargal.
34 karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiyellaam Isravel Puththirar Seydhu, Thangal Thangal Kodigalinkeezh Paalayamirangi, Thangal Thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Vamsangalinpadiye Prayaanappattupponaargal.
